slide1.title: Embark on Your Career Odyssey with searchit!
slide1.subtitle: Discover, Connect, Thrive – Your Perfect Job Awaits
slide1.text: Are you ready to turn your career dreams into reality? Look no further than searchit, the ultimate companion for job seekers like you.

slide2.title: Welcome to searchit: Your Gateway to Exceptional Talent!
slide2.subtitle: Revolutionize Your Hiring Experience with Our Premier Recruitment Platform
slide2.text: Are you ready to elevate your team with top-tier talent? Enter searchit – the ultimate solution for companies seeking exceptional professionals to drive success. Say goodbye to traditional hiring hassles and welcome a new era of streamlined, efficient recruitment.

slide3.title: Welcome to searchit: Discover Leading IT Companies!
slide3.subtitle: Find the Perfect Workplace for Your Career Growth
slide3.text: Explore our curated list of top IT companies known for their innovation and commitment to employee growth. Whether you’re looking for a dynamic startup or an established tech giant, our platform provides detailed insights into various companies to help you find the ideal workplace. Start your journey today and connect with the companies that align with your professional goals and values.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.section1: A CV builder option on a web app provides users with a streamlined and user-friendly tool to create professional and visually appealing resumes. It offers a range of customizable templates, allowing individuals to easily input their personal and professional information. The intuitive interface guides users through the process, offering helpful suggestions and tips to enhance the overall quality of the CV.
aboutUs.section2: We strive to provide a seamless platform that connects candidates with their dream opportunities, fostering a space where career aspirations align seamlessly with employers seeking top-tier talent. With innovation at our core, we aim to redefine the job search experience, making it not just efficient, but also a source of inspiration and growth for every user.
aboutUs.section3: With advanced filtering and matching algorithms, our platform ensures that companies can effortlessly discover the perfect candidates for their job openings. Streamlined and user-friendly, our application empowers employers to efficiently navigate through a pool of qualified individuals, saving time and resources in the pursuit of building exceptional teams.
aboutUs.section4: Embark on your career journey with our cutting-edge job searching web app, tailored to help candidates uncover their ideal job opportunities. Our platform empowers users to navigate through a myriad of positions, ensuring a seamless and efficient job-hunting experience. Our user-centric design ensures that you discover and connect with the perfect job that aligns with your skills and aspirations.

placeholderPosition: Specify the position's title, such as Software Developer, Network Engineer, or IT Support Specialist.
job_title_min: Job Title must be at least 3 characters!
job_title_max: Job Title must be less than 30 characters!
placeholderDesc: Provide a detailed description of the job responsibilities, including specific tasks, projects, and expectations.
job_desc_min: Job Description must be at least 10 characters!
job_desc_max: Job Description must be less than 255 characters!
placeholderLocation: Specify the location of the job, whether it's on-site, remote, or a combination.
location_min: Location must be at least 4 characters!
location_max: Location must be less than 15 characters!
preferred_years: and preferred years of experience are:
salary_placeholder: Specify the position's salary, such as 15KM/hr or 2000KM monthly
qualification_placeholder: Outline the required qualifications, including education, certifications, and relevant experience.
skills_placeholder: List the technical and soft skills required for the position. This could include programming languages, software proficiency, communication skills, etc.
benefits_placeholder: Highlight any additional perks, benefits, or unique aspects of your company culture.
application_note: Note: If you publish the post, it will be visible to all candidates, allowing them to send applications. Alternatively, if you save it as a draft, you can edit and publish the job post later.
publish_job_post: Are you sure you want to publish this job post?
note_job_post: Note: If you publish the post, it will be visible to all candidates, allowing them to send applications.
